name: Adventure Flotilla
description: A floating musical performance featuring beloved Disney characters and catchy tunes.

name: Asian Small-Clawed Otters - Disney Animals
description: Watch the playful and adorable Asian small-clawed otters in their habitat.

name: Chakranadi
description: A river that flows through the park, providing a scenic backdrop for attractions like Kali River Rapids.

name: Discovery River Cruise - Pocahontas
description: A peaceful boat journey that retells the story of "Pocahontas" through live performances.

name: Discovery River Cruise - The Lion King
description: A live-action retelling of "The Lion King" performed on a boat floating along Discovery River.

name: Expedition Everest - Legend of the Forbidden Mountain
description: Embark on a thrilling roller coaster adventure as you encounter the mysterious Yeti on the legendary Forbidden Mountain.

name: Feathered Friends in Flight!
description: A lively bird show featuring free-flying macaws and other exotic bird species.

name: Gibbons - Disney Animals
description: Hear the haunting calls of the gibbons and learn about these acrobatic primates.

name: Kali River Rapids
description: Brave the rapids of the Chakranadi River on a thrilling water rafting expedition.

name: Komodo Dragons - Disney Animals
description: Encounter the largest living lizard species in their exhibit.

name: Maharajah Jungle Trek
description: Explore lush forests and ancient ruins while encountering Asian animals like tigers and Komodo dragons.

name: Migratory Birds at Maharajah Jungle Trek - Disney Animals
description: Encounter various migratory bird species at the Maharajah Jungle Trek in Asia.

name: Tigers - Disney Animals
description: See these powerful big cats in their lush Asian environment.

name: Yak & Yetiâ„¢ Restaurant
description: Savor pan-Asian dishes in a beautifully themed restaurant inspired by the travels of the proprietress.

name: Affection Section
description: A petting zoo area at Rafiki's Planet Watch where guests can interact with farm animals.

name: Conservation Station
description: A dedicated area for learning about animal care, conservation efforts, and interacting with wildlife.

name: Invertebrates at Conservation Station - Disney Animals
description: Learn about various invertebrate species, including insects and arachnids, at Conservation Station.

name: The Animation Experience at Conservation Station
description: An interactive drawing class at Rafiki's Planet Watch where guests learn to draw Disney characters and learn about their conservation stories.

name: African Birds - Disney Animals
description: Discover a diverse range of African bird species in their natural habitats.

name: African Elephants - Disney Animals
description: Witness the beauty and majesty of African elephants in their savannah setting.

name: African Hogs - Disney Animals
description: Encounter fascinating African hogs in their naturalistic environment.

name: African Lions - Disney Animals
description: Encounter the "king of the jungle" in a habitat that mimics the African savannah.

name: Ankole Cattle - Disney Animals
description: Observe the distinctive long-horned Ankole cattle from Africa.

name: Black Rhinos - Disney Animals
description: Observe the elusive and endangered Black Rhinoceros in a spacious habitat.

name: Festival of the Lion King
description: A Broadway-style musical celebration of the "Lion King" story with stunning performances and acrobatics.

name: Flamingos at Africa - Disney Animals
description: See the elegant flamingos wading through their African-themed environment.

name: Giraffes - Disney Animals
description: Marvel at the graceful and towering giraffes as they roam the savannah.

name: Gorilla Falls Exploration Trail
description: Walk along this trail to observe gorillas, hippos, meerkats, and exotic birds in their habitats.

name: Gorillas - Disney Animals
description: A gorilla habitat where guests can observe these magnificent primates up close.

name: Harambe Village Acrobats
description: Be amazed by the acrobatic talents of this African performance group in Harambe village.

name: Hippopotamuses - Disney Animals
description: See the "river horses" in a watery setting, showcasing their unique semi-aquatic lifestyle.

name: Kilimanjaro Safaris
description: Embark on an authentic African safari adventure to encounter a wide variety of wildlife in their natural habitats.

name: Meerkats - Disney Animals
description: Observe the charming meerkats as they display their social behavior.

name: Okapis - Disney Animals
description: Observe these elusive forest giraffes in a habitat that resembles the dense rainforest.

name: Tam Tam Drummers of Harambe
description: Enjoy the energetic beats of these African drummers in Harambe village.

name: Tusker House Restaurant
description: Enjoy a lively character dining experience with African-inspired cuisine.

name: White Rhinos - Disney Animals
description: Learn about and appreciate the critically endangered Southern White Rhinoceros.

name: Wildlife Express Train
description: Hop aboard the Wildlife Express Train to Rafiki's Planet Watch, offering a behind-the-scenes look at animal care and conservation.

name: Zebras at Africa - Disney Animals
description: Observe zebras in their African habitat.

name: Zebras at Kilimanjaro Safaris - Disney Animals
description: Spot the striking black-and-white striped zebras during your Kilimanjaro Safaris expedition.

name: Animal Encounters: Winged Encounters â€“ The Kingdom Takes Flight
description: Marvel at the majestic sight of macaws as they take to the sky in this bird presentation.

name: Beacons of Magic
description: Dazzling nighttime lighting effects that enhance the beauty of the park's iconic structures.

name: Cotton-Top Tamarins - Disney Animals
description: Watch the playful and adorable cotton-top tamarins in their habitat.

name: Discovery Island Drummers Flotilla
description: A lively musical flotilla that cruises along Discovery River.

name: Discovery Island Trails
description: Scenic walking paths around the Tree of Life where you can encounter various animal exhibits.

name: DiVine
description: A living, nature-themed character that blends into the surroundings, surprising and delighting guests as she moves through the foliage.

name: Flamingos at Discovery Island - Disney Animals
description: View the vibrant flamingos as they gracefully move through their lagoon.

name: It's Tough to be a Bug!
description: A 3D show inside the Tree of Life that features characters from "A Bug's Life" and highlights the importance of insects in nature.

name: Kora Tinga Tinga
description: A captivating musical and acrobatic performance showcasing the rich African culture.

name: Meet Favorite Disney Pals at Adventurers Outpost
description: Meet Mickey and Minnie in their adventurer attire at this character meet-and-greet location.

name: Migratory Birds at The Oasis Exhibits - Disney Animals
description: Discover migratory birds amidst lush vegetation at The Oasis Exhibits.

name: Migratory Birds at Tree of Life - Disney Animals
description: Observe migratory birds from various species at the Tree of Life.

name: The Oasis Exhibits
description: A tranquil area at the park's entrance showcasing various animals like giant anteaters and exotic birds.

name: Tiffins Restaurant
description: A signature dining restaurant that celebrates the art of traveling and features global cuisine.

name: Tree of Life
description: A stunning 145-foot-tall tree adorned with intricate animal carvings and housing the "It's Tough to be a Bug!" attraction inside.

name: Tree of Life Awakenings
description: Stunning projections on the Tree of Life depicting various animal stories and natural wonders.

name: Tree of Life Awakenings: A Beacon of Magic
description: A mesmerizing projection show that brings the Tree of Life to life with captivating stories.

name: Viva Gaia Street Band!
description: Enjoy the vibrant rhythms of this street band, spreading musical joy around the park.

name: Vultures - Disney Animals
description: Observe these vital scavengers and learn about their ecological role.

name: Wilderness Explorers
description: An interactive experience where guests can become Wilderness Explorers, completing challenges and earning badges throughout the park.

name: Avatar Flight of Passage
description: Experience an exhilarating flight on the back of a banshee through the breathtaking landscapes of Pandora.

name: Na'vi River Journey
description: Glide through the bioluminescent forests of Pandora on a boat ride filled with mesmerizing sights and sounds.

name: Dino-Sue
description: See the impressive replica of a Tyrannosaurus Rex skeleton, named Sue, in DinoLand U.S.A.

name: DINOSAUR
description: Go back in time on a wild and bumpy journey to save a dinosaur from extinction in this dark ride.

name: Donald's Dino-Bash!
description: Join Donald Duck and friends for a prehistoric party filled with fun and games.

name: Finding Nemo: The Big Blue... and Beyond!
description: A musical stage show featuring characters from "Finding Nemo" and "Finding Dory.

name: Fossil Fun Games
description: Enjoy fun and challenging carnival-style games with a prehistoric twist.

name: The Boneyard
description: A fun-filled play area where kids can dig for fossils, explore a maze, and have imaginative adventures.

name: TriceraTop Spin
description: A dinosaur-themed spinner ride where guests can soar through the air on their very own Triceratops.

name: Disney KiteTails
description: A high-flying show featuring colorful kites shaped like Disney characters and wildlife.

name: Mickey and Friends Flotilla
description: A boat parade where Mickey Mouse and friends greet guests from the water.

name: Rainforest CafeÂ® at Disney's Animal Kingdom
description: Dine in a lively rainforest environment with animatronic animals and tropical surroundings.
